courses.title: Introduction to Graphic Design
courses.description: Learn the basics of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and layout.

courses.title: Photoshop for Beginners
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of Adobe Photoshop and start creating stunning graphics.

courses.title: Advanced Illustrator Techniques
courses.description: Take your Adobe Illustrator skills to the next level with advanced techniques and tips.

courses.title: Logo Design Masterclass
courses.description: Learn how to create professional logos that stand out and represent brands effectively.

courses.title: Web Design Essentials
courses.description: Understand the principles of web design and how to create visually appealing websites.

courses.title: Typography for Designers
courses.description: Explore the art of typography and how to use it effectively in your designs.

courses.title: Digital Illustration
courses.description: Learn how to create beautiful digital illustrations using various tools and techniques.

courses.title: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the basics of UX/UI design and how to create user-friendly interfaces.

courses.title: Motion Graphics with After Effects
courses.description: Learn how to create stunning motion graphics using Adobe After Effects.

courses.title: Creative Poster Design
courses.description: Master the art of poster design and create eye-catching posters for various purposes.
